Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.client.CLI

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.client.CLI.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientNetworkObserver, ModelObserver, ViewInterface, java.lang.Runnable
public class CLI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ViewInterface, ClientNetworkObserver
concrete class that represents all the interactions with the client

      Specified by:
      requestDomeOrBuild in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      validForBuild - represents the valid cells for the build action of each worker

    • containsWorker

      public WorkerValidCells containsWorker​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> arr, int row, int column)
      method used in the functions handling the game board, to see if a certain selected position is among the valid ones
      Parameters:
      arr - is the list containing the valid worker positions
      row - is the row selected by the player for the worker to use
      column - is the column selected by the player for the worker to use
      Returns:
      true if the worker is valid, else false
